alert.note: Alert for Bullock; Elmore; Macon; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Elmore, northwestern Bullock, southwestern Macon and northeastern Montgomery Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 530 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Emerald Mountain to near Franklin Field. Movement was west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Eastern Montgomery, Milstead, Pike Road, Shorter, Liverpool, Auburn University In Montgomery, Emerald Mountain, Hardaway, Eastdale Mall, Mount Meigs, Tysonville, Victoryland, Waugh, Lagoon Park, Blue Ridge, Sedgefield, Mitylene, Cross Keys, Brassell and Ware. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
